decision_conditions: Condition : 1 - The development hereby permitted shall be begun before the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.

Condition : 2 - The proposed development shall be carried out in all respects in accordance with the proposals contained in the application and the plans submitted (Design and Access Statement, dated 8th July 2014, received 25/07/2014; N1402/0A/01 Rev A, dated 08-08-14; N1402/0A/02, dated 20-06-14; N1402/1A/01 Rev A, dated 08-08-14; N1402/1A/02, dated 20-06-14; received 11/08/2014) therewith and approved by the Local Planning Authority, or as shall have been otherwise agreed in writing by the Local Planning Authority before the building is used.
Condition : 3 - The materials to be used in the construction of the external surfaces of the extension hereby permitted shall match those used in the existing building.
Condition : 4 - The window and roof lights, shown on the approved drawings as obscure glazed and non-opening, shall be retained as such for the lifetime of teh development.
description: Erection of rear roof extensions incorporating two front roof windows to the flat.
